SEARCH
Package camppkg

Class CampInformation

java.lang.Object
camppkg.CampInformation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CampInformation extends Object implements Serializable
CampInformation represents the wrapper for the information the staff supplies. Also the information can be viewed by relevant students.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • CampInformation

      public CampInformation(String campName, String startDate, String endDate, String registrationClosingDate, Boolean openToWholeNTU, Faculty userGroup, String location, int totalSlots, int campCommitteeSlots, String description, String staffInCharge)
      Constructs a new CampInformation object,
      Parameters:
      campName - the name of the Camp
      startDate - the start date of the camp event
      endDate - the end date of the camp event
      registrationClosingDate - the registration closing date
      openToWholeNTU - whether the camp is open to whole NTU
      userGroup - faculty that the camp is opened to
      location - location of the camp
      totalSlots - total number of slots for all roles
      campCommitteeSlots - total number of slots for Camp Committee Members
      description - description of the camp
      staffInCharge - Staff in charge of this camp
